1: The staff made our 3 day stay tolerable but I would not go back there until at least the construction was complete

There was a bit of a mix up with our booking and they wanted to put us in a room in reception

So when we got there desk rep said the only room left was the standard king room and not the king de luxe
Went to front desk to ask if we could switch rooms and they said the people were checking out that day
